description: Linux 6.12-rc3 is out today as expected as the newest weekly release candidate in working Linux 6.12 toward a stable release in November...
title: Linux 6.12-rc3 Released With Some Late NTFS Driver Enhancements

description: With a number of patches queued this week into the staging tree ahead of the Linux 6.13 kernel, a number of old and no longer maintained hardware drivers are set to be removed in the next kernel cycle...
title: Linux 6.13 To Drop Some Old & No Longer Maintained Staging Drivers

description: As a result of user feedback and being able to reproduce some annoying ad experiences, particularly on mobile devices, I've been able to make some enhancements to hopefully improve the user ad experience when browsing Phoronix...
title: Improvements To The Ad Experience

description: Building off the recent infrastructure merged for Mesa 24.3 as a build option to allow Rusticl driver support to be enabled by default, Red Hat's Karol Herbst has added the Asahi Gallium3D driver to the default list...
title: Mesa 24.3 Allows Rusticl On Asahi Gallium3D By Default

description: Adding to the growing set of features for NVK as this open-source NVIDIA Vulkan driver within Mesa, the VK_KHR_fragment_shading_rate fragment shading rate extension is now supported...
title: Mesa NVK Vulkan Driver Adds VK_KHR_fragment_shading_rate Support

description: While Azure Linux 3.0 has been available since the late summer, for those continuing to rely on Azure Linux 2.0 in production there is a big update out this weekend. Azure Linux 2.0.20241006 brings dozens of security fixes to this Microsoft Linux distribution...
title: Microsoft's Azure Linux 2.0 Updated With Dozens Of Security Fixes
